snippet: Since the European Central Bank took steps to assure the banks could borrow money, and it became clear that Germany was not willing to allow the euro zone to break up, euro zone bank stocks have been among the best investments around.
lead_paragraph: Since the European Central Bank took steps to assure the banks could borrow money, and it became clear that Germany was not willing to allow the euro zone to break up, euro zone bank stocks have been among the best investments around.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: Is the Banking Crisis Over?
